definition: (table tennis) edge ball/(fig.) actions that are technically legal but perhaps not respectable
to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish
suffix of a noun of locality
to bend the rules/to skirt around the issue

sentences.english: Edge ball can help you to get the point immediately.
sentences.chinese: 擦邊球能幫助你立即得分。

sentences.english: So he and his team did an end run.
sentences.chinese: 於是他和他的團隊打了擦邊球。

sentences.english: "They are walking a fine line, " Wagner said.
